settings.disableEmberRodAbility: द्वीप एम्बर रॉड को अक्षम करें
settings.ignoreItemFrameClicks: फ़्रेम आइटम पर क्लिक को अनदेखा करें
settings.stopBowChargeFromResetting: रीसेट करने से धनुष चार्ज बंद करो
settings.dontResetCursorInventory: सूची के बीच कर्सर को रीसेट न करें
settings.makeEnderchestsInEndGreen: Change Enderchest Color in the End
settings.dontOpenProfileWithBow: धनुष के साथ प्रोफ़ाइल न खोलें
settings.stopDroppingSellingRareItems: रेयर वस्तु को गिराना / बेचना बंद करें
settings.replaceRomanNumeralsWithNumbers: समायोजन -> नंबर के साथ रोमन अंकों को बदलें
settings.changeBarColorForPotions: समायोजन -> औषधि के लिए बार रंग बदलें
settings.onlyMineOresDeepCaverns: Only Mine Ores in the Deep Caverns
settings.onlyMineValuablesNether: Only Mine Valuables in the Nether
settings.enableMessageWhenActionPrevented: Show a Message When an Action is Prevented
settings.hideNightVisionEffectTimer: Hide the Night Vision Effect Timer
settings.showBackpackPreviewInAH: Show Backpack Preview for Your Items While AH is Open
settings.skyblockAddonsButtonInPauseMenu: Show SBA Button in Pause Menu
settings.showZealotsPerEye: Zealot Counter - Show Zealots Per Eye
settings.turnBowGreenWhenUsingToxicArrowPoison: Color Bow Green When Using Toxic Arrow Poison
settings.onlyBreakLogsPark: Only Break Logs in the Park
settings.baitListDisplay: Show Bait List While Holding a Rod

messages.labymod: Labymod Users: Hide Food, Armor, and Health Bar, is incompatible.
messages.minionCannotReach: A %type% minion cannot reach and has stopped spawning!
messages.minionIsFull: A minion on your island is full!

update.majorAvailable: एक नया प्रमुख अपडेट (%version%) उपलब्ध है! डाउनलोड के लिए लिंक चैट में पाया जा सकता है।
update.patchAvailable: एक नया पैच अपडेट (%version%) उपलब्ध है! डाउनलोड के लिए लिंक चैट में पाया जा सकता है।

messages.cancelledStemBreak: SkyblockAddons ने आपको इस स्टेम को तोड़ने से रोक दिया है।यदि आप वास्तव में इसे तोड़ना चाहते हैं तो अपने हाथ का उपयोग करें।
messages.cancelledProfileOpening: A feature has stopped you from opening this player's profile since you were holding a bow.
messages.cancelledDropping: A feature has stopped you from dropping this "rare" item or tool from your hotbar.
messages.clickMoreTimes: इस आइटम को %times% बार क्लिक / ड्रॉप करें यदि आप वास्तव में ऐसा करना चाहते हैं।
messages.clickOneMoreTime: Click/drop this item 1 more time if you really want to do this.
messages.cancelledDeepCaverns: A feature has stopped you from mining this block here.
messages.switchedSlots: You have just switched from a locked slot or rare item. Please wait a bit before dropping!
messages.clickToOpenFolder: Click to open your mods folder!
messages.firstStatus: This status will appear at the top
messages.secondStatus: This status will appear under your first status
messages.fallbackStatus: This status will appear when your automatic status has nothing to show
messages.cancelledPark: A feature has stopped you from breaking this block here.
messages.bossApproaching: You are close to spawning a boss!

discordStatus.descriptionPurse: Shows the amount of coins in your purse
discordStatus.descriptionStats: Shows your HP, Defense and Mana stats
discordStatus.descriptionItem: Shows the name of the item you're holding
discordStatus.descriptionTime: Shows the current Skyblock time. E.g. 12:00am 1st Early Winter
discordStatus.descriptionAuto: Automatically displays a status. E.g. your zealot count while in the end.
